[[File:Dungeon ticket v2.png|thumb|350px]] ===Description=== This ticket grants access to all [[Dungeons]] in the [[Kanto]] region.
Tip: You gain [[Dungeon Tokens]] by re-capturing Pok√©mon. ===Acquisition=== Can be purchased at [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Viridian City shop]] ===Effects=== You can enter [[Dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
